subject: Battery comparison
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I thought I had a bad tuner, seems to be more battery related as I have
dual sweep in this box. To me that means other boxes are right on the edge
of maxing out the battery current capacity.  Maybe I need to switch to NiMh
batteries.

 F-S
